attributes.action: Introduce mental health to be taught in high schools
attributes.additional_details: I know that more and more young people are suffering alone or dont understand why they feel the way they do. The statistics show that more young people are effected by mental health that is the evidence.
attributes.background: Mental health awareness should be taught in high schools. I feel very passionate about this, as so many young people are taking their own lives due too their not being enough support or understanding. Please sign this so we can take it to parliament. Thankyou
